name: World of warPETS
description:
Experience the Awe of battleship-size gun turrets mounted on the backshell of a giant sea turtle. Fight against the mighty Castle Crab filled with deadly mortars.

Made  for LD41, first time I publish something, even if it's a mess at first upload. So If you like the concept and want to see it pushed further, share your thoughts on it, good and bad. Right now the mechanics are shit, far from what I had in mind (got stuck on turrets logic for a long time so many feats got dumped due to time)

(No audio, full of bugs, be gentle with prototype ...)
